00001 #ifndef _MYTIMER_H_
00002 #define _MYTIMER_H_
00003 #include <windows.h>
00004 
00005 class MyTimer {
00006 private:
00007     LONGLONG _freq;
00008     LARGE_INTEGER _begin;
00009     LARGE_INTEGER _current;
00010     LARGE_INTEGER _end;
00011 
00012 public:
00013     LONGLONG costTime;            // 花费的时间(精确到ms)
00014 
00015 public:
00016     MyTimer() {
00017         LARGE_INTEGER tmp;
00018         QueryPerformanceFrequency(&tmp);
00019         _freq = tmp.QuadPart;
00020         costTime = 0;
00021     }
00022 
00023     void Start() {
00024         QueryPerformanceCounter(&_begin);
00025     }
00026 
00027     void End() {
00028         QueryPerformanceCounter(&_end);
00029         costTime = (LONGLONG)((_end.QuadPart - _begin.QuadPart) * 1000000 / _freq);
00030     }
00031 
00032     LONGLONG getElapsedTime() {
00033         QueryPerformanceCounter(&_current);
00034         return (LONGLONG)((_current.QuadPart * 1000000 - _begin.QuadPart* 1000000)  / _freq);
00035     }
00036 
00037     void Reset() {
00038         costTime = 0;
00039     }
00040 
00041     inline unsigned __int64 GetCycleCount() {
00042         __asm _emit 0x0F
00043         __asm _emit 0x31
00044     }
00045 };
00046 #endif
